item.description: For anyone with a spiffy new Video iPod, we have encoded a ready made version of the trailer for direct download.

item.title: V for Vendetta November 5th, 2005
item.description: Read Guy Fawkes's history, then play a game of Hangman. Best to the bonfires!!!

item.title: V for Vendetta July 27th, 2005
item.description: Trailer debuts at San Diego Comic Con, to an audience of over 6,000.

item.title: V for Vendetta July 21st, 2005
item.description: Yes, it is true. The Vendetta trailer debuted at Comic Con and now, those who were not there will see it online shortly.

item.title: V for Vendetta July 15th, 2005
item.description: Right this moment at the annual Comic-Con in San Diego, a panel for V FOR VENDETTA is starting up.

item.title: V for Vendetta June 27th, 2005

item.title: V for Vendetta May 13, 2005
item.description: Right this moment V is telling Evey who he is. They are in the Shadow Gallery.
